title: Kantoku, Neko na Ore wa Dame desu ka
original_name: 監督、ネコな俺はダメですか
sinopse:
Daichi enters the gay porn world as a model who plays tops and immediately gains popularity. However, he's actually an exclusive bottom who used sex toys on his ass every night!!! Although he dreams of playing a bottom role with Kouhei, the actor he admires, for some reason, he's very popular as a top. Of course he could never request to play the bottom... Living his life in frustration, one day he happens to meet director Sasakawa on set...who's actually his beloved Kouhei-kun!!

(Source: Sankosha, translated)

Included one-shots: Konomi no Type wa Toshishita Osananajimi (My Younger Childhood Friend is Just My Type), Shiawase no Sono Saki e
